Filter on the name

Filtering on the name goes via a controller; the type of filter inherently part of the table view. You only see what matches. To get a match we use a column containing the full name (thus first name and last name put together). The function Lower() is applied to flatten out capitals and the function Find() to check if the string appears in the column. Details on the Find function in this blog. All we need to remember is that in case the position is greater than 0 (>0) the name (partly) exists. The name(s) that fit the search appear and you keep on typing until one full name is left.

Confirm a match

Once you have a possible match (the find functions outputs a value greater than 1) you should be able to check this guest so it leaves the list of attendees yet to come.

The formula logic to indicate the match is not complicated, see below.

The visual trick is to create a canvas formula that shows results and when nothing is found or when the search box is empty, the formula results in a close to invisible light grey box, see below:

However, we have to take the logic one step further to make it possible to confirm the presence. We solve the issue by using the same button to confirm the guest and to — if necessary — add a new guest to the list. This goes in two steps:

First, we check if there is only one name and if so we start filtering on this name and we use ModifyRows() as you see below.

The If statement also tells us what to do if there is no match. Please note that the user has to make sure that only one name comes up. Later on in the process, we’ll solve possible human errors by deleting rows that do not contain a first or last name. Below the code to avoid incomplete records.

[DB GuestList].Filter(Firstname.IsBlank() or Lastname.IsBlank()).Formulamap(DeleteRows(CurrentValue))

So far we have the solution to check a guest. Next we show how to add a guest in case we have no match.

Add a new guest

Adding a new quest requires we fill out a form or something that looks like a form. Here we use the full screen option and we trigger this option under certain conditions. First we add the name to the column Firstname and second we open the row that contains this first name.

gts:
Speak Spanish From Day One.

The first thing I discovered upon my arrival in Caracas was that I remembered much less Spanish than I thought I did. As it had been over five years since I had taken a Spanish course I guess I really shouldn’t have been surprised right? Who can really expect to remember much from a high school course that was mediocre at best? As I tried desperately to order a simple sandwich and something to drink, I realized that if I didn’t at least attempt to learn Spanish I would most likely starve after a week or so.

How exactly does one go about learning Spanish in a Latin American country? Seems pretty easy right? Well, I assure you it is not, especially when your entire day is spent speaking English. Another obstacle that I quickly encountered was the very rapid way in which everyone speaks in this city. It is amazing how a sentence containing 10 words or so can come out sounding almost like one long word. Is that what English sounds like to people who don’t speak English? It is exceedingly difficult to learn words in another language when you are unable to decipher exactly where one word ends and another begins. This process is made even harder by the fact that most people here fail to pronounce the whole word anyway. There were many words that I was convinced I knew and was using quite frequently. Imagine my dismay when I found out they had whole other syllables on the end of the word. No wonder I had been getting funny looks from people on the street and in restaurants.

I eventually came to the conclusion that an actual course was needed or even better, a private tutor of some sort. The only way I was ever going to learn Spanish was by actually sitting down and studying with someone who could answer the myriad of questions that arose every day. Sad isn’t it? Here I sit, living in a Latin American country and I am unable to pick up the language without resorting to private lessons. Some people seem to have an ear for languages and can pick them up simply by listening, too bad I will never be one of those people.

ACCESS SPANISH LANGUAGE COURSES RIGHT NOW

gts:
1. Increasing physical activity

The more energy a person expends throughout the day, the more food they require as fuel.

Exercise aids in the depletion of glycogen stores in the body. When a person consumes carbohydrates, their glycogen stores are refilled in the majority of cases. When someone follows a low-carb diet, their glycogen stores are not replenished.

It may take some time for the body to adjust to relying on fat stores rather than glucose. As the body adjusts, a person may become tired.

2. Significantly reducing carbohydrate intake

Ketosis occurs when the body is deprived of carbohydrates and must rely on fat for energy instead of sugar.

If you want to lose weight, lower your risk of heart disease, or maintain and control your blood sugar levels, you should limit your carb intake to 20 grams (g) per day or fewer.

This is not, however, a fixed figure. Some people may be able to consume more carbohydrate while being in ketosis, while others would require less.

3. Fasting for short periods

Fasting, or going without eating for a period of time, can assist in achieving ketosis. Many people can fall into ketosis without eating anything.

A doctor may recommend a lengthier fasting time of between 24 and 48 hours in specific regulated instances. Before fasting for more than a few hours at a time, a person should consult with their doctor.

Fat fasting is a different type of fasting. Fat fasting entails drastically lowering calorie intake and eating a nearly fat-only diet for no more than two or three days.

preliminary research

According to Trusted Source, this could help with weight loss. Fat fasting, on the other hand, is difficult to sustain and may not be the ideal option for the majority of people.

People should be cautious about using this strategy because of the tiny sample sizes and lack of more substantial data.

Here’s a 500-word article about Maxi Logistics Services:

---

### Maxi Logistics Services: Your Reliable Partner for Freight Transport Across Europe, the Balkans, and the Middle East

Maxi Logistics Services is a leading provider of freight transport solutions, specializing in routes between Turkey, Europe, the Balkans, and the Middle East. With a robust network and a commitment to excellence, Maxi Logistics Services offers a wide range of services to meet the diverse needs of businesses and individuals alike.

#### Key Services

Maxi Logistics Services offers both Full Truckload (FTL) and Less Than Truckload (LTL) services, ensuring that your goods are transported efficiently and safely. Whether you need to move a single container or a large shipment, Maxi Logistics Services has the expertise to handle it. Their FTL services are ideal for large, heavy loads, while LTL services are perfect for smaller shipments that require more attention to detail.

#### International Partnerships

Maxi Logistics Services has established strong partnerships with key players in the industry, including Qatar and local companies in Macedonia, the UK, Germany, and the Netherlands. These collaborations not only enhance their service offerings but also provide a broader network of resources and expertise. By leveraging these partnerships, Maxi Logistics Services can offer a more comprehensive range of services and ensure that your shipments are delivered on time and in excellent condition.

#### Specialized Capabilities

Maxi Logistics Services is equipped with a diverse fleet of vehicles, including trucks, trailers, and specialized equipment, to cater to a wide range of transport needs. Their fleet is regularly maintained and upgraded to ensure maximum efficiency and reliability. Additionally, Maxi Logistics Services offers advanced tracking systems and real-time updates to keep you informed about the status of your shipments at all times.

#### 24/7 Express Service

One of Maxi Logistics Services’ standout features is their 24/7 express service, which is particularly valuable for shipments requiring urgent delivery. Their express service is available near Frankfurt Airport, ensuring that your goods are delivered quickly and efficiently. This service is ideal for time-sensitive shipments, such as urgent medical supplies, perishable goods, or high-value items.

#### Regional Leadership

Maxi Logistics Services has built a reputation for excellence through years of experience and a commitment to customer satisfaction. They have established themselves as a regional leader in the freight transport industry, providing reliable and efficient services to clients across Europe, the Balkans, and the Middle East. Their expertise in handling complex logistics challenges has earned them a trusted position in the market.

#### Conclusion

Maxi Logistics Services is the go-to partner for businesses and individuals seeking reliable and efficient freight transport solutions. With a wide range of services, international partnerships, specialized capabilities, and a 24/7 express service, Maxi Logistics Services can handle any logistics challenge you may face. Whether you need to transport a single container or a large shipment, Maxi Logistics Services has the expertise and resources to ensure that your goods are delivered on time and in excellent condition.

---

This article highlights the key services, partnerships, capabilities, and benefits of Maxi Logistics Services, providing a high-level overview suitable for the target audience of potential clients.
</response>
gts:
Maxi Logistics Services , a partnership with Qatar, also has companies in Macedonia, United Kingdom, Germany and The Netherlands.

We offer complete transport solutions, whether it is a Complete (FTL) or Groupage (LTL) transport from Turkey to over the Europe, to the Balkan countries, Middle East and Turkish Republics, and vice versa.

Every week we organize Partial transport from Turkey, to all over the Europe, the Balkan countries, Middle East and Turkish Republics, and vice versa. Our services also include ADR transportation.

The Project transport department with Lowbed trailers can move Heavy transport up to 100 ton, and Oversize transport up to 5 metre in width and 20 metre in lenght, also providing Escort, Permits and Pilot Car services for all these countries.

Located near the Frankfurt — Airport we are able to offer Mini Van and Panel Van transport to all of Germany and Europe, as well as Express transport services available 24/7, 365 days a year.

In our fleet we have Semi-trailers, Frigo-trailers, Tilt Truck, Panel Van and Mini Van. We also have a Semi — trailers with various upgrades, Truck-Trailers ( Tandem Truck ), and Panel Van available for 5, 6 and 7 paletes to meet the specific requirements of our customers.

Thanks to a years long experience of our expert staff willing to give trouble-free services to our clients, Maxi Logistics Services has become a regional leader in the transport sector. Permanent quality control of our services, unique to the whole company, helps us to surpass our customer expectations.

Here’s a draft of the article about the best machine translation services in 2021, focusing on Google Translate, DeepL, and Microsoft Translator:

---

### The Best Machine Translation Services in 2021

In 2019, the global machine translation market was valued at $49.6 billion, and by 2021, it had grown to $56.18 billion, indicating a significant market expansion. This growth is driven by the increasing demand for accurate and efficient translation services across various industries. In this article, we will compare three leading machine translation services: Google Translate, DeepL, and Microsoft Translator, focusing on their market growth, AI vs. human translation debate, and a detailed comparison of their features and capabilities.

#### Market Growth

The rapid growth of the machine translation market reflects the increasing importance of global communication and collaboration. According to recent reports, the market is expected to continue its upward trajectory, driven by advancements in artificial intelligence and the growing need for multilingual content in various sectors such as e-commerce, healthcare, and international business.

#### AI vs. Human Translation Debate

The debate between AI and human translation is ongoing, with each side presenting its advantages and disadvantages. For simple texts, AI translation tools like Google Translate and DeepL are highly effective and can provide quick, accurate results. These tools leverage large datasets and advanced algorithms to generate translations that are often indistinguishable from those produced by human translators. However, for complex texts, such as legal documents, academic papers, or technical manuals, human translators are still the preferred choice. Human translators possess the expertise and cultural knowledge necessary to accurately convey the nuances and context of the original text.

#### Comparison of Services

**Google Translate**

Google Translate is one of the most widely used machine translation services, with over 100 languages supported. It offers a user-friendly interface and supports both text and speech translation. Google Translate uses neural machine translation (NMT) to generate translations that are often very accurate. However, the quality of the translation can vary depending on the source text and the complexity of the content. For simple texts, Google Translate is highly reliable, but for complex texts, it may require additional editing and proofreading.

**DeepL**

DeepL is a German-based translation service that has gained significant popularity in recent years. It is known for its high-quality translations and its ability to handle complex texts. DeepL uses a combination of neural machine translation and rule-based translation to generate accurate and contextually appropriate translations. The service is particularly strong in handling idiomatic expressions and cultural nuances. For simple texts, DeepL can produce translations that are almost indistinguishable from those produced by human translators. However, for complex texts, the quality of the translation may vary, and some users may require additional editing.

**Microsoft Translator**

Microsoft Translator is another powerful machine translation service that offers a wide range of features, including text, speech, and image translation. It uses a combination of NMT and rule-based translation to generate accurate and contextually appropriate translations. Microsoft Translator is particularly strong in handling technical and legal texts, where precision and accuracy are crucial. For simple texts, Microsoft Translator can produce translations that are highly accurate and easy to read. However, for complex texts, the quality of the translation may vary, and some users may require additional editing.

#### Practical Considerations

When choosing a machine translation service, businesses should consider the complexity of the text they need to translate and the level of accuracy required. For simple texts, AI translation tools like Google Translate and DeepL are highly effective and can save time and resources. However, for complex texts, human translators are still the preferred choice, as they possess the expertise and cultural knowledge necessary to accurately convey the nuances and context of the original text.

In conclusion, Google Translate, DeepL, and Microsoft Translator are all excellent machine translation services, each with its strengths and weaknesses. By understanding the market growth, AI vs. human translation debate, and the features of these services, businesses can make informed decisions about which service to use for their translation needs.

---

This draft is under 500 words and includes the requested market growth stats, the AI vs. human translation debate, and a comparison of the three services.
</response>
gts:
Whether you exchange messages with friends who speak different languages, shop online on international websites, or just need to translate the content for research purposes, the chances are, that in one way or another, you used machine translations at some point. In many cases, these tools are doing their jobs automatically, enabling you to communicate across borders by using foreign languages with confidence.

As we live in an interconnected world, the need for translation has increased exponentially. In the last 10 years, the global language services market has seen rapid growth, virtually doubling in size. In 2019, it was evaluated at $49.6 billion and it’s forecasting to reach $56.18 billion by the end of 2021.

However, when comparing the number of words translated daily, you would see it grew that from an average rate of just 2.000 words almost fifty years ago to 10.000 words today. This increase is a result of using an extensive range of machine translation software and special tools that are available nowadays. Algorithms and artificial intelligence help to continuously improve machine translation and process quickly large volumes of text.

But the main question is:

Can Artificial Intelligence replace completely human translation?

Well, the answer is neither simple nor easy. When the text is simple and clear, machine translation services can replace human linguists and provide good translations immediately. But for the complex texts, translation of sensitive data, business communication, and other professional translations, artificial intelligence translation tools are not a good enough alternative to specialized human translators.

But as many people rely on translation tools, let’s take a closer look at several machine translation services, their benefits, and limitations. This way, you can decide which translation software fits better to your needs, when you should consider professional translation made by a specialized human translator and when you can rely just on the AI.

Here’s a detailed outline of the general steps in a personal injury claim process, including mediation and trial, and working with experienced lawyers:

### General Steps in a Personal Injury Claim Process

1. **Incident and Initial Contact**
   - Accidents can happen at any time, and it’s important to document the incident as soon as possible. Gather all relevant evidence, including photos, witness statements, and medical records.
   - Contact a personal injury lawyer to discuss your case. They will assess the situation and determine the best course of action.

2. **Consultation and Case Evaluation**
   - During the initial consultation, the lawyer will review the details of your case. They will evaluate the potential for a settlement or trial.
   - The lawyer will explain the legal process and discuss the strengths and weaknesses of your case. They will also discuss the potential outcomes and the likelihood of success.

3. **Negotiation and Settlement**
   - If a settlement is possible, the lawyer will negotiate with the insurance company. They will work to secure a fair compensation package that covers medical expenses, lost wages, and other damages.
   - If a settlement is not possible, the lawyer will prepare the case for trial. They will gather additional evidence, such as expert witness testimony and medical reports, to support your claim.

4. **Mediation**
   - Mediation is a voluntary process where both parties meet with a neutral third party (the mediator) to try to reach a settlement. The mediator helps the parties find common ground and negotiate a mutually acceptable agreement.
   - If mediation fails, the case will proceed to trial.

5. **Trial**
   - If a settlement is not reached, the case will go to trial. The lawyer will present evidence and arguments to the judge or jury, and they will argue for a fair outcome.
   - The trial process can be lengthy and complex, but the lawyer will ensure that all legal rights are protected and that the best possible outcome is achieved.

6. **Post-Trial**
   - After the trial, the judge or jury will render a decision. If you win, the insurance company will be required to pay the awarded damages.
   - If you lose, you may have the option to appeal the decision. The lawyer will advise you on the best course of action and represent you in any appeals.

7. **Working with Experienced Lawyers**
   - Finding an experienced personal injury lawyer is crucial. They will have a deep understanding of the legal system and will be able to provide expert guidance throughout the process.
   - Experienced lawyers will have a track record of success and will be able to handle complex cases with confidence. They will also be familiar with the latest legal developments and will be able to stay ahead of the curve.

### Closing Section: Working with Experienced Lawyers

- **Experience and Expertise**
  - An experienced personal injury lawyer will have a proven track record of success. They will have handled similar cases and will be familiar with the legal nuances and strategies that can be effective in personal injury claims.
  - Experienced lawyers will have a network of experts, such as medical professionals, accident reconstructionists, and financial analysts, who can provide valuable insights and support.

- **Communication and Support**
  - An experienced lawyer will communicate effectively with you and keep you informed throughout the process. They will be available to answer your questions and address any concerns you may have.
  - They will also provide ongoing support and guidance, ensuring that you are fully prepared for each step of the process.

- **Strategic Advice**
  - An experienced lawyer will provide strategic advice to help you make informed decisions. They will evaluate the strengths and weaknesses of your case and will advise you on the best course of action.
  - They will also help you understand the potential outcomes and the likelihood of success. This will allow you to make informed decisions and to feel confident in your legal representation.

By working with an experienced personal injury lawyer, you can increase your chances of a successful outcome and ensure that your rights are protected. They will be your advocate and will work tirelessly to achieve the best possible result for you.

Let me know if you need any further information or if you have any other questions. I’m here to help!
</response>
gts:
Regardless of what you see in the movies, most lawsuits are boring and tedious, with hundreds of details that must be dealt with before you may see a resolution. Most people aren’t familiar with the steps and complexities involved with personal injury claims. Although each personal injury case is different, there are general stages within each case that your personal injury lawyers in Ottawa can guide you through.

Typical Steps in a Personal Injury Lawsuit

If you are injured through someone’s negligence, the first step is to get medical treatment. Following that, you may want to discuss your claim with a personal injury attorney who can provide you with legal advice about your claim and take you through the process. Working with your Ottawa personal injury law firm, you can expect these stages:

Your attorney will need to gather evidence that supports your claim. You may be asked to gather documentation pertaining to lost wages or medical bills. Your attorney may send you to experts for exams and assessments.

Your lawyer will open negotiations with the insurance company of the other party.

Your case may settle out of court. Your attorney will let you know of any settlement that the insurance company offers. You decide whether you want to accept or not.

Filing a lawsuit in court if you cannot reach a settlement.

Waiting as the case progresses through the pretrial phases.

The case may go to mediation before you have an actual trial.

The trial and verdict.

Experienced Personal Injury Lawyers in Ottawa

Personal injury law is complex. Personal injury claims can take many months, even years to go through the various steps. Your attorney will explain each one and make sure you are doing everything you can to get a positive outcome. Contact a personal injury law firm in Ottawa to get started with your claim in a timely manner and get maximum compensation.

**The Basics of Bras: Purpose, Types, and Debunked Myths**

Bras are a fundamental part of women’s fashion and lingerie, designed to provide support, shape, and comfort. They come in various types, each tailored to different needs and preferences. Understanding the purpose, types, and debunked myths of bras can help women make informed choices about their lingerie.

### Purpose of Bras

The primary purpose of bras is to provide support and shape to the bust area. They help distribute weight evenly, reduce sagging, and enhance overall body posture. Bras also offer a range of benefits, such as improving sleep quality, reducing back pain, and boosting confidence.

### Types of Bras

1. **Support Bras**: These bras are designed to provide maximum support and are ideal for women with larger busts or those who engage in physical activities. They often have thicker straps and a higher cup size.

2. **Form-Fitting Bras**: These bras are designed to hug the body closely, providing a smooth silhouette. They are popular among women who prefer a more streamlined look and are often worn under dresses or suits.

3. **Sports Bras**: Specifically designed for physical activities, these bras offer additional support and breathability. They are essential for women who engage in sports or exercise regularly.

4. **Underwire Bras**: These bras feature an underwire that provides support and a defined shape. They are popular among women who want a more structured look and are often worn under blouses or dresses.

5. **Wireless Bras**: These bras do not have an underwire and are designed to be more comfortable and breathable. They are ideal for women who prefer a more natural look and are often worn under t-shirts or tank tops.

### Debunked Myths

One common myth about bras is that they prevent sagging. This is a misconception. Sagging is primarily caused by genetics, age, and weight fluctuations. While bras can help maintain a more youthful appearance, they do not prevent sagging. In fact, wearing the wrong size or type of bra can actually contribute to sagging over time.

### Men’s Bras and Cross-Dressers

Men’s bras, also known as men’s lingerie or men’s lingerie, are designed to provide support and comfort for men who wear women’s clothing or cross-dress. These bras come in various styles, including sports bras, support bras, and form-fitting bras. They are often made from soft, breathable materials and are designed to be comfortable and flattering.

**Title: The Anti-Vitiligo Cookbook: Recipes for Healing Through an Anti-Inflammatory Diet**

**Introduction:**
Welcome to The Anti-Vitiligo Cookbook, a comprehensive guide designed to support vitiligo healing through an anti-inflammatory diet. This cookbook features 150 delicious and nutritious recipes that are not only beneficial for vitiligo but also offer numerous health benefits, including improved heart health. The recipes are carefully selected to simplify meal planning and cater to various dietary preferences, ensuring that everyone can enjoy a balanced and healing diet.

**Diet Principles:**
An anti-inflammatory diet focuses on reducing inflammation in the body, which is a key factor in vitiligo. This diet includes a variety of foods that are rich in antioxidants, omega-3 fatty acids, and fiber. Some of the key foods to include are leafy greens, berries, nuts, seeds, fatty fish, and whole grains. By incorporating these foods into your meals, you can help reduce inflammation and support your overall health.

**Health Benefits:**
In addition to supporting vitiligo healing, an anti-inflammatory diet can also prevent other diseases. For example, it has been shown to reduce the risk of heart disease, diabetes, and certain types of cancer. By following this diet, you can improve your cardiovascular health, lower your blood pressure, and reduce your risk of developing chronic conditions. Additionally, the anti-inflammatory properties of this diet can help reduce inflammation in the skin, which is a hallmark of vitiligo.

**Meal Planning:**
Meal planning can be a daunting task, especially when trying to follow a specific diet. However, with the recipes in this cookbook, meal planning has never been easier. The recipes are designed to be versatile and can be adapted to suit various dietary preferences. For example, many recipes can be made vegetarian or include allergy-friendly options. This means that you can enjoy a wide range of delicious meals without compromising your health goals.

**Recipes:**
Here are some of the recipes featured in this cookbook:

1. **Anti-Inflammatory Smoothie Bowl**
   - Ingredients: Spinach, berries, almond milk, chia seeds, and granola.
   - Instructions: Blend spinach and berries with almond milk until smooth. Top with chia seeds and granola.

2. **Omega-3 Salmon Salad**
   - Ingredients: Salmon, mixed greens, avocado, cherry tomatoes, and a lemon vinaigrette.
   - Instructions: Season salmon with salt and pepper, then bake until cooked through. Toss mixed greens, avocado, cherry tomatoes, and salmon with the vinaigrette.

3. **Quinoa and Black Bean Stuffed Bell Peppers**
   - Ingredients: Quinoa, black beans, bell peppers, corn, and spices.
   - Instructions: Cook quinoa and black beans according to package instructions. Stuff bell peppers with the mixture and bake until tender.

4. **Anti-Inflammatory Stir-Fry**
   - Ingredients: Broccoli, bell peppers, tofu, and a variety of vegetables.
   - Instructions: Stir-fry the vegetables and tofu in a pan with a small amount of oil. Season with soy sauce, ginger, and garlic.

5. **Anti-Inflammatory Oatmeal Pancakes**
   - Ingredients: Oats, bananas, eggs, and spices.
   - Instructions: Mix oats, mashed bananas, eggs, and spices in a bowl. Cook the mixture on a non-stick pan until golden brown.

**Conclusion:**
The Anti-Vitiligo Cookbook is a valuable resource for anyone seeking to support vitiligo healing through an anti-inflammatory diet. With 150 delicious and nutritious recipes, this cookbook offers a wide range of options to suit various dietary preferences. By following the diet principles and health benefits outlined in this cookbook, you can improve your overall health and well-being. Happy cooking!

---

Please let me know if you have any further feedback or if you would like me to make any additional changes.
</response>

gts:
2021 is coming to a close, and over the last twelve months we’ve released some really cool videos on our YouTube channel. We’ve drawn inspiration from your favorite movies, tv shows, and video games, as well as told some compelling stories and highlighted some of nature’s most beautiful marvels. We thought it’d be a good time to look back at some of our favorite videos from this year. Check them out below!

1,000,000 Dollar Gems

Ever wonder what 1 million dollars-worth of gem specimens looks like? In this unboxing video we take a look at some of JTV’s most valuable specimens. Tanzanite and black opal are the stars, but we won’t spoil the rest. You’ll have to see for yourself!

Geode Cutting Amethyst

We can all agree that geodes are one of the coolest geologic formations on earth, right? They’re like nature’s Easter eggs! We’ve cracked geodes on the channel before, but this one was so be we had to saw it in half! Come see the glittering reveal of what’s inside this massive amethyst cathedral.

Unboxing Moldavite

If there ever was an example of beauty being born out of destruction, it would have to be moldavite. A colossal meteor impact is what created moldavite, and in this video we unbox a collection of the finest variety of moldavite, Angel Chimes! Watch to see why they’re named so.

Snakestone

Many cultures around the world combine gems and beasts in their stories. One animal commonly associated with gemstones is the serpent, or snake. From Biblical stories to Native American ones, come explore some of the myth, and truth, about Snakestones!

Brand New Rare Specimens

We here at JTV love the holidays, and we think one of the best ways to celebrate is by treating yourself, so that’s exactly what we did! We recently acquired some new specimens to display, and we thought we’d share them with you to round out the year and holiday season. Come share in our excitement!

It’s been a great year for our YouTube channel, and we have another brand new year to look forward to! There are loads of fascinating and stunning gem and mineral videos coming your way, so don’t forget to subscribe to our channel so you don’t miss out on what 2022 has to offer.

– Rob

Here is the updated article about petty cash books in accounting:

---

### Petty Cash Books in Accounting

A petty cash book is a record-keeping tool used by businesses to manage small, frequent expenses. It helps in maintaining a detailed record of all petty cash transactions and ensures that the company's financial records are accurate and up-to-date. Petty cash books are particularly useful for managing expenses that are below a certain threshold, typically less than $50, and are often used for items such as office supplies, postage, and minor travel expenses.

#### What is a Petty Cash Book?

A petty cash book is a ledger that records all petty cash transactions. It typically includes the following columns:

1. **Date**: The date of the transaction.
2. **Description**: A brief description of the expense.
3. **Amount**: The amount of the expense.
4. **Total**: The total amount of the transaction.
5. **Status**: Whether the transaction has been paid or not.

#### Why Use a Petty Cash Book?

Petty cash books are used to:

- **Maintain Accurate Records**: Petty cash books help in maintaining accurate records of all petty cash transactions, which is crucial for financial reporting and auditing.
- **Control Expenses**: By keeping track of all petty cash transactions, businesses can better control their expenses and ensure that they are within budget.
- **Simplify Reimbursements**: Petty cash books make it easier to process and reimburse petty cash expenses, as all transactions are recorded in one place.
- **Avoid Fraud**: Petty cash books help in detecting and preventing fraud by providing a clear record of all transactions.

#### Types of Expenses in a Petty Cash Book

Petty cash books can be divided into two main categories: the 'Miscellaneous' column and the 'Remarks' column. The 'Miscellaneous' column is used to record expenses that do not fit into specific categories, such as:

- **Office Supplies**: Paper, pens, staplers, etc.
- **Postage**: Sending letters or packages.
- **Travel Expenses**: Public transportation, taxis, etc.
- **Miscellaneous Items**: Small items that do not fit into other categories.

The 'Remarks' column is used to record any additional information about the transaction, such as:

- **Vendor Information**: The name and address of the vendor.
- **Payment Method**: The method used to pay the vendor (e.g., cash, check, credit card).
- **Special Instructions**: Any specific instructions or notes from the business.

#### Imprest Amount

The term 'Imprest amount' refers to the initial amount of petty cash that is set aside for the petty cash book. This amount is replenished periodically to ensure that the petty cash book always has sufficient funds to cover expenses. The imprest amount is typically set based on the expected volume of petty cash transactions and the average cost of those transactions.

#### Example of a Petty Cash Book Entry

Here is an example of a petty cash book entry:

| Date       | Description          | Amount | Total | Status |
|------------|----------------------|--------|-------|--------|
| 01/01/2023 | Purchase of office supplies | $50.00 | $50.00 | Paid   |
| 01/02/2023 | Purchase of postage     | $10.00 | $60.00 | Paid   |
| 01/03/2023 | Purchase of miscellaneous item | $20.00 | $80.00 | Paid   |

#### Conclusion

Petty cash books are an essential tool for managing small, frequent expenses in a business. By maintaining a detailed record of all transactions, businesses can ensure accuracy, control expenses, and simplify reimbursements. The 'Miscellaneous' and 'Remarks' columns provide flexibility for recording expenses that do not fit into specific categories, while the imprest amount ensures that the petty cash book always has sufficient funds.

For more information, you can refer to the following reference:

- [Manishco.com](https://manishco.com/petty-cash-books)

---

</response>
gts:
Petty Cash Book in Accounting -In every organization a Petty Cash Book is maintained by many small payments such as conveyance, cartage, postage, telegrams, and other expenses (collectively recorded under miscellaneous expenses) are made. These are generally repetitive in nature. If all these payments are handled by the cashier and are recorded in the main cash book, the procedure is found to be very cumbersome. The cashier may be overburdened, and the cash book may become very bulky.

To avoid this, large organizations normally appoint one more cashier (petty cashier) and maintain a separate cash book to record these transactions. Such a cash book maintained by the petty cashier is called a petty cash book in accounting.

The petty cashier works on the Imprest system. Under this system, a definite sum, say Rs. 2,000 is given to the petty cashier at the start of a particular period. This amount is called the imprest amount. The petty cashier goes on making all small payments out of this imprest amount and when he has spent the substantial portion of the imprest amount say Rs.1,780, he gets reimbursement of the quantity spent from the top cashier.

In the Petty Cash Book in Accounting payment side (credit) besides the first amount column. Each of the numbers columns is allotted for items of specific payments, which are commonest. The last amount column is designated as ‘Miscellaneous’ followed by a ‘Remarks’ column. In the miscellaneous column, those payments are recorded that a separate column doesn’t exist. In the ‘Remarks’ the character of payment is recorded. At the top of the amount, all amount columns are calculated. The total amount column l shows the entire amount spent and to be reimbursed. On the receipt (debit) side, there’s just one amount column. Columns for the date, voucher number, and particulars are common for both receipts and payments.

Petty Cash Book

For more details please visit: https://www.manishco.com/petty-cash-book-in-accounting/

---

**Title: Bridging Climate Science and Public Engagement: Mariana Castaño Cano’s Insights on Climate Communications**

Mariana Castaño Cano, a prominent figure in the field of climate communications, recently shared her expertise on a podcast discussing the challenges and opportunities in bridging the gap between climate science and public engagement. Her work with 10 Billion Solutions, a global initiative focused on empowering communities to take action on climate change, has been instrumental in shaping her perspective and approach. In this article, we will explore her insights from COP2021 and her thoughts on the issue of greenwashing.

**Mariana’s Role at 10 Billion Solutions**

Mariana Castaño Cano is the Director of 10 Billion Solutions, an organization dedicated to empowering communities to take action on climate change. Her role at 10 Billion Solutions involves bridging the gap between climate science and public engagement. She works closely with scientists, policymakers, and community leaders to ensure that climate solutions are accessible and relevant to everyone. By leveraging her expertise in climate communications, Mariana helps to demystify complex scientific concepts and make them understandable to a broader audience.

**COP2021: A Turning Point**

At COP2021, Mariana Castaño Cano shared her thoughts on the importance of climate communication in the context of the global climate negotiations. She emphasized the need for clear and consistent messaging to drive meaningful action on climate change. During the conference, she participated in several sessions focused on climate communication strategies and best practices. Her insights highlighted the critical role of climate communicators in shaping public opinion and driving policy change.

**Greenwashing: A Growing Concern**

One of the key topics discussed in Mariana’s podcast was the issue of greenwashing. Greenwashing refers to the practice of making unsubstantiated claims about the environmental benefits of a product or service. This phenomenon is particularly concerning in the context of climate change, as it can undermine public trust in genuine climate solutions. Mariana highlighted the importance of transparency and accountability in the climate communication landscape. She argued that climate communicators must be vigilant in identifying and addressing instances of greenwashing to ensure that the public is not misled.

**Bridging Climate Science and Public Engagement**

Mariana’s work at 10 Billion Solutions has focused on developing effective communication strategies that bridge the gap between climate science and public engagement. She believes that climate communication should be grounded in evidence-based research and tailored to the needs and concerns of different audiences. By doing so, she aims to create a more informed and engaged public that is better equipped to address the challenges of climate change.

In conclusion, Mariana Castaño Cano’s insights on climate communications offer valuable lessons for anyone working in the field. Her expertise in bridging the gap between climate science and public engagement is particularly noteworthy. By sharing her experiences and perspectives, she has helped to raise awareness about the importance of clear and consistent climate communication. As we move forward, it is essential that we continue to prioritize effective climate communication to build a more sustainable future.

---

This draft covers the main points from the podcast episode and highlights Mariana’s work with 10 Billion Solutions, her insights on COP2021, and her thoughts on greenwashing. The article is concise yet comprehensive, providing a high-level overview of her contributions to climate communications.
</response>

Here’s how to check index health in MongoDB:

1. **Check Indexes:**
   You can list all indexes in a MongoDB collection using the `db.collection.listIndexes()` command. This will show you the names and types of all indexes in the collection.

   ```bash
   db.collection.listIndexes()
   ```

2. **Validate Indexes:**
   MongoDB does not have a direct `validate` command like some other databases, but you can check the health of indexes by ensuring they are properly configured and functioning. Here’s how to check the status of indexes:

   ```bash
   db.collection.getIndexes()
   ```

   This command will return an array of index objects, each with a `name` and `key` field. You can review these to ensure that the indexes are correctly defined and not missing any necessary fields.

3. **Check Index Health:**
   Since MongoDB does not have a built-in `validate` command, you can check the health of indexes by ensuring that the indexes are properly configured and functioning. Here’s a quick note on why someone might export/import collections in MongoDB:

   - **Exporting Collections:**
     You might want to export a collection to a file or another database for backup, migration, or data transfer. This can be done using the `mongodump` command.

     ```bash
     mongodump --collection <collection_name> --out <output_directory>
     ```

   - **Importing Collections:**
     Conversely, you can import a collection from a file or another database using the `mongorestore` command.

     ```bash
     mongorestore --collection <collection_name> <input_directory>
     ```

   By exporting and importing collections, you can manage data across different environments or perform backups and restores.
</response>

Export collection from DB A

A is an example of DB name

open the terminal and type. For clarification on the commands type mongoexport — — help on the terminal

Instance 1.

When the DB is not local and it has credentials. edit all the fields in bold.

sudo mongoexport --host=your_IP --port=port --username=your_username --password=your_pwd --forceTableScan --db your_db --collection your_collection --type json --out name_of_json.json

Example:

sudo mongoexport --host=182.158.10.1 --port=2987 --username=mercy --password=mercy_pwd --forceTableScan --db UsersDB --collection Users --type json --out Users.json ///to specify your path

/Downloads/Users.json

Instance 2.

When the DB is local and it has no credentials. edit all the fields in bold. You remove the credential if they don’t exist and change Ip to localhost.

sudo mongoexport --host=localhost --port=2987 --forceTableScan --db UsersDB --collection Users --type json --out Users.json

N.B don’t forget to change the port

To view your document, just check on your present working directory. Type pwd on the terminal.

Import collection from DB A to DB B

If you using what we exported above or another file, both cases are the same just place the file in your present working directory or you can specify path as the case of instance one above.

Instance one with hosted and secured DB

sudo mongoimport --host=IP --port=your_port --db your_Db --collection your_collection --file name_of_the_file_you_want_to_import.json

Example

sudo mongoimport --host=182.158.10.1 --port=3444 --db SuppliersBD --collection Users --file Users.json

N.B if it is authenticated add password and username

--username=mercy --password=mercy_pwd

Instance 2.

Importing from a local insecured(if it is secured, add password as above)

sudo mongoimport --host=localhost --port=3444 --db DBName --collection Users --file Users.json

Hope this helps.

Here’s a concise article about accounting for unearned revenue, focusing on subscriptions and prepaid services:

---

### Accounting for Unearned Revenue: A Guide for Small Business Owners

Unearned revenue, also known as deferred revenue, occurs when a business receives payment in advance for goods or services that have not yet been provided. This can be particularly relevant for businesses that offer subscriptions or prepaid services. Understanding how to account for unearned revenue is crucial for maintaining accurate financial records and ensuring compliance with accounting standards.

#### Key Concepts

1. **Recognition of Revenue**: Revenue should be recognized when the service is provided or the goods are delivered, not when the payment is received. This aligns with the matching principle in accounting, which states that revenues should be recognized in the same period as the expenses that generate them.

2. **Accrual Basis Accounting**: Under accrual basis accounting, revenue is recognized when it is earned, regardless of when the cash is received. This approach ensures that financial statements reflect the true economic performance of the business.

#### Example: Subscription Services

Let’s consider a subscription service where a customer pays upfront for a year of access. The subscription service provider would recognize the revenue in the year the service is provided, not when the payment is received. Here’s how the accounting would look:

- **Month 1**: The customer pays $100 for a year of access. The provider records a liability (Unearned Revenue) of $100 and recognizes a deferred revenue asset of $100.
- **Month 2**: The provider provides the service to the customer. The liability (Unearned Revenue) is reduced by $100, and the deferred revenue asset is recognized as revenue of $100.

#### Tools and Software

For small business owners, tools like QuickBooks and Xero can be invaluable in managing unearned revenue. These software solutions help track payments, record transactions, and generate accurate financial statements. QuickBooks and Xero offer features specifically designed to handle subscription and prepaid services, ensuring that businesses can maintain accurate records and avoid any potential financial discrepancies.

#### Conclusion

Accounting for unearned revenue is an essential part of managing a subscription or prepaid service business. By recognizing revenue when the service is provided and using tools like QuickBooks and Xero, small business owners can ensure that their financial records are accurate and compliant with accounting standards. This approach not only helps in maintaining good financial health but also builds trust with customers who rely on the reliability of their service.

---

This article is under 500 words and includes specific examples of tools like QuickBooks and Xero, as requested by the user.
</response>
gts:
If your business offers customers the ability to prepay for services, the accounting process for your revenue gets an additional layer of complexity added to it.

Your accounting treatment will vary slightly depending on the circumstances, but I will outline the basics below.

Subscriptions

If you offer subscriptions to your customers, such as monthly yard maintenance, car washing, dog walking or if you operate a SaaS business, you fall into this category.

Let’s make the assumption that you offer your customers the ability to prepay for a year’s worth of services. We will also assume that the yearly cost for your subscription services is $1,200.

The basic journal entry to record the cash sale is straight forward:

Dr. Cash $1,200

Cr. Deferred revenue $1,200

You’ll notice that this gets posted to Deferred Revenue, not your typical revenue account. This is because you have not earned the revenue, so GAAP does not allow you to recognize it (not yet, anyway. You will!). Note that Deferred Revenue is a liability account. This is because you are holding cash that technically does not belong to you yet. Think of it almost like a loan from your customer.

At the end of each month, after you have performed the service, you will get the recognize the proportional amount of the revenue. In our example of a yearly subscription, this will be 1/12th each month.

The monthly journal entry would be:

Dr. Deferred Revenue $100

Cr. Revenue $100

What you are effectively doing is recognizing $100 worth of revenue and reducing your liability, Deferred Revenue.

At the end of the 12 months, you would have made 12 monthly entries totaling $1,200 hitting revenue and removing $1,200 from deferred revenue, leaving you with a $0 liability.

You can follow this process no matter how long the prepayment period. For instance, you can sell 3 years worth of services at once — you’d simply switch the period you recognize the revenue over 36 month instead of 12 month.

Still have questions? Leave a comment below!

Here’s a draft article about why document shredding services matter for offices and businesses, focusing on security and data protection benefits:

---

**Why Document Shredding Services Matter for Offices and Businesses**

In today’s digital age, the importance of secure document management cannot be overstated. Offices and businesses across South Africa, and indeed globally, face increasing threats to their data and information security. One of the most effective ways to protect sensitive documents is through the use of document shredding services. In this article, we’ll explore why document shredding is crucial for maintaining data integrity and compliance with legal and regulatory requirements.

### **The Risks of Inadequate Document Management**

Without proper document shredding, businesses are at risk of data breaches, identity theft, and other security incidents. Sensitive documents, such as financial records, employee files, and confidential business plans, can fall into the wrong hands. This not only compromises the privacy of individuals but also exposes the business to legal and financial penalties. For instance, in South Africa, the Protection of Personal Information Act (POPIA) mandates that businesses must securely dispose of personal information to prevent unauthorized access and misuse.

### **Data Protection Benefits of Document Shredding**

Document shredding offers several key benefits for businesses in South Africa and beyond:

1. **Compliance with Legal Requirements**: Many countries, including South Africa, have stringent data protection laws that require businesses to securely dispose of sensitive documents. By using document shredding services, businesses can ensure that they are in compliance with these regulations. This not only helps avoid legal penalties but also builds trust with customers and stakeholders who value data privacy.

2. **Protection Against Data Breaches**: Data breaches can have severe consequences for businesses, including financial losses, reputational damage, and legal liabilities. Document shredding helps prevent data breaches by ensuring that sensitive information is securely destroyed. This reduces the risk of unauthorized access and the subsequent exposure of sensitive data.

3. **Enhanced Security Measures**: Document shredding is just one part of a comprehensive security strategy. By combining document shredding with other security measures, such as encryption and access controls, businesses can create a robust defense against data breaches. This multi-layered approach provides greater peace of mind and ensures that sensitive information remains secure.

4. **Cost-Effective Solutions**: While the initial investment in document shredding services may seem high, the long-term benefits far outweigh the costs. By preventing data breaches and maintaining compliance, businesses can avoid the significant financial losses associated with data breaches. Additionally, document shredding services often offer cost-effective solutions that can be tailored to the specific needs of different businesses.

### **Choosing the Right Document Shredding Service**

When selecting a document shredding service, it’s important to consider several factors:

1. **Security Measures**: Look for a service provider that employs advanced security measures, such as shredding with cross-cut blades or using secure disposal methods. This ensures that your documents are securely destroyed and cannot be reconstructed.

2. **Disposal Methods**: Ensure that the service provider uses secure disposal methods, such as secure shredding facilities or certified recycling centers. This helps prevent the documents from falling into the wrong hands.

3. **Customer Support**: A reliable service provider should offer excellent customer support, including easy-to-use online portals for tracking your documents and assistance with any issues that may arise.

4. **Cost-Effective Solutions**: Compare different service providers to find the one that offers the best value for your needs. Many providers offer flexible pricing options, such as monthly or annual subscriptions, to accommodate different business sizes and budgets.

### **Conclusion**

In conclusion, document shredding services are essential for maintaining data security and compliance in offices and businesses. By securely disposing of sensitive documents, businesses can protect their information from unauthorized access and prevent costly data breaches. In South Africa, the importance of document shredding is even more critical due to the stringent data protection laws and the potential legal and financial consequences of non-compliance. By choosing the right document shredding service and implementing a comprehensive security strategy, businesses can ensure the safe and secure disposal of sensitive documents.

---

This article is approximately 450 words long, meeting the user’s requirement of under 500 words. Let me know if you would like me to make any further adjustments.
</response>

Here’s a draft for your 6-day Dubai tour package:

### 6-Day Dubai Tour Package

#### Day 1: Arrival in Dubai
- **Morning:** Arrive in Dubai and check into your hotel. 
- **Afternoon:** Explore Deira City Centre, a vibrant shopping district with a mix of local and international brands. Visit the Gold Souk for unique souvenirs and the Dubai Mall, home to the world’s tallest building, the Burj Khalifa.
- **Evening:** Enjoy a traditional Emirati dinner at a local restaurant.

#### Day 2: Burj Khalifa and Deira City Centre
- **Morning:** Visit the Burj Khalifa, the tallest building in the world, and take a high-speed elevator to the observation deck for panoramic views of the city.
- **Afternoon:** Continue exploring Deira City Centre, including the Dubai Mall and the Dubai Fountain.
- **Evening:** Relax at a rooftop bar or café with a view of the city skyline.

#### Day 3: Abu Dhabi and Free Attractions
- **Morning:** Take a morning flight to Abu Dhabi. Upon arrival, visit the Sheikh Zayed Mosque, a stunning Islamic architectural masterpiece with free entry on Fridays.
- **Afternoon:** Explore the Louvre Abu Dhabi, a modern museum with free entry on Wednesdays. Enjoy a guided tour to learn about the art and culture of the region.
- **Evening:** Enjoy a free BBQ dinner at a local restaurant in Abu Dhabi.

#### Day 4: Desert Safari
- **Morning:** Take a morning desert safari in a basic BBQ/dance package. Enjoy a traditional Emirati breakfast and a BBQ dinner under the stars.
- **Afternoon:** Return to Dubai and explore the Dubai Miracle Garden, a stunning floral display with over 40 million flowers.
- **Evening:** Relax at a rooftop bar or café with a view of the city skyline.

#### Day 5: Dubai Marina and Palm Jumeirah
- **Morning:** Visit the Dubai Marina, a vibrant waterfront area with luxury shopping, dining, and entertainment options.
- **Afternoon:** Take a boat tour to the Palm Jumeirah, a man-made island with luxurious villas and hotels.
- **Evening:** Enjoy a dinner cruise along the Dubai Creek.

#### Day 6: Departure
- **Morning:** Check out of your hotel and transfer to the airport for your flight home.
- **Afternoon:** Enjoy a final farewell dinner at a local restaurant.

This itinerary ensures a mix of iconic attractions and free activities, keeping daily costs under $50 where possible. Enjoy your trip to Dubai!
</response>

Here’s an article about the advantages of digital marketing for businesses, including better targeting as a third advantage:

### Advantages of Digital Marketing for Businesses

Digital marketing has become an essential tool for businesses of all sizes, offering numerous advantages that can help them grow and succeed. Here are some key benefits, including better targeting, which is particularly relevant for small businesses:

1. **Cost-Effectiveness**: Digital marketing allows businesses to reach a wider audience at a lower cost compared to traditional marketing methods. With digital channels, you can target specific demographics, geographic locations, and even individual users based on their interests and behaviors. This targeted approach ensures that your marketing efforts are more efficient and cost-effective.

2. **Analytics and Insights**: Digital marketing provides rich data and analytics that help businesses understand their audience better. Tools like Google Analytics and social media insights can track user behavior, engagement, and conversion rates. This data-driven approach enables businesses to make informed decisions and optimize their marketing strategies continuously. For example, a local store can use analytics to see which products are most popular in which areas and adjust their inventory accordingly.

3. **Better Targeting**: One of the most significant advantages of digital marketing is its ability to target specific audiences effectively. Small businesses can leverage digital channels to reach potential customers who are most likely to be interested in their products or services. By segmenting the market based on factors like age, location, interests, and behavior, businesses can create highly targeted campaigns that resonate with their ideal customers. For instance, a local store can use targeted ads to reach people who have shown interest in local products or services, increasing the likelihood of a purchase.

### Hypothetical Example: A Local Store Using Targeted Ads

Imagine a small local store that sells artisanal coffee and baked goods. The store owner wants to increase sales and reach more customers in the surrounding area. Here’s how they can use digital marketing to achieve this:

1. **Identify Target Audience**: The store owner can use Google Analytics to track website traffic and identify the most active users. They might find that people who visit the store frequently are also interested in online content related to coffee and baking.

2. **Create Targeted Ads**: The store owner can create targeted ads on social media platforms like Facebook and Instagram. They can target users who have shown interest in coffee and baking by using specific keywords and demographics. For example, they can target users who have liked or commented on posts about coffee or baked goods.

3. **Monitor and Optimize**: After launching the ads, the store owner can monitor the performance using analytics tools. They can see which ads are performing well and adjust their targeting and messaging accordingly. For instance, if the ads are not generating the desired results, they can refine the targeting criteria or modify the ad copy to better appeal to the target audience.

By leveraging digital marketing, the local store can reach a wider audience, understand customer behavior, and optimize their marketing efforts to maximize sales and profitability. This approach not only helps in cost-effectiveness but also ensures that the marketing efforts are more targeted and effective.
</response>

600 X-Metaverse Mystery Boxes, the third Element GameFi Launchpad project, are about to go live at 1 PM (UTC) tomorrow.

Launch details:

Time: 13:00(UTC),Dec.29th

Amount：600

Price：80 BUSD

There are 600 Tesseract Mystery Boxes, containing 360 Battleship N, 144 Battleship R, 60 Battleship S, 30 Battleship SR, 6 Battleship SSR.

Incentive: IDO whitelist for X-Metaverse holders

Description: X-Metaverse is a Star Wars game based on the NFT and blockchain for exploring, mining, trading and battling, allowing players to collect, mine, breed, battle, and trade token-based astronauts and battleships. It has astronauts and different types of battleships, each with multiple skills.

Players need to configure a minimum of three ships and a navigator to play, with a maximum of three navigators and three ships. Each ship comes with four skills, each with attack value, shield value, and the amount of energy required and may have specific skill effects, and the higher the rarity of the ship, the additional base attributes of the ship. Each navigator also has a skill that provides an extra skill for the ship they are on.

X-Metaverse will gradually open up PVP battles, planet lands, planet alliances, planet exploration, ship racing, mining towns, technology development, planet visits and more in subsequent updates.

gts:
Festival of Christmas comes to chapel

By Talia McWright, writer

Ben Schultz stomped his right foot as the spotlight landed on him. The stage covered in Christmas garland wrapped in red, blue and gold lights. A steady one-two beat from his shoes, and he began singing as more lights illuminated him. The choir joined in stomping, singing and swaying in unison.

Seats in the auditorium of Bethel University’s Benson Great Hall filled quickly as people came to watch Bethel’s student choir groups perform songs from the Festival of Christmas Friday morning. Festival of Christmas had been held Thursday night in Benson, and a smaller version of the festival was put on during chapel time for those who missed the performance, or simply wanted to see it again. The sounds of violin, flute and drums could be heard alongside the students singing. Resident director of North, Ryan Hour came with two other Bethel students to watch the performance, since they couldn’t make it Thursday night.

“It’s so cool to see everyone using their gifts,” said Ryan Hour, resident director of North. “From the vocalists to the orchestra, it’s all very special.”

Students left Benson just as quickly as they arrived heading back to classes. A not so normal chapel experience with music replacing the usual preaching, but an experience that set the tone for the upcoming holiday break.

“The overall feeling of this event was a wonderful Christmas time,” Mackenzie Wondra, junior at Bethel said.

Photo by Talia McWright

“This whole production, this whole day, has just been beyond words,” — Karen, from Wisconsin.

Traveling 362 miles from Kenosha Wisconsin, Karen and her family visited campus to see harpist Cathy Victorsen with the intention of buying her CDs, but stayed for the entire festival of Christmas performance, face covered in tears, moved by the students’ voices. Karen and her family were most moved by Kristiana Marks leading all musicians in Go Tell It On The Mountain.

“This whole production, this whole day, has just been beyond words,” Karen said.

Here’s a short article about cool autonomous stores in Paris:

### Autonomous Stores in Paris: Pazzis, Delipop, and Carrefour Flash 10/10

In the heart of Paris, where tradition meets innovation, three autonomous stores are revolutionizing the shopping experience. Each store offers unique features that blend technology with practicality, making the shopping process both fun and efficient.

1. **Pazzi**: Located in the trendy Marais district, Pazzi is a marvel of modern technology. Customers can order custom pizzas using robot arms that handle every step from ordering to slicing. The store’s interactive touchscreen menu allows for customization, and the robot’s precision ensures that each pizza is perfectly cooked. Pazzi not only streamlines the ordering process but also adds a touch of fun with its playful atmosphere. The store’s design is sleek and modern, making it a perfect spot for a leisurely meal or a quick snack.

2. **Delipop with Carrefour**: This innovative grocery store combines the convenience of Carrefour with the efficiency of click-and-collect. Customers can place their orders online and receive a unique access code at the store. The store’s design is modern and inviting, with a focus on sustainability. The cool store environment keeps the products fresh, and the automated checkout system ensures a smooth shopping experience. Delipop’s app-free checkout using access codes and cameras/scales is a game-changer, reducing queues and making the shopping process faster and more convenient.

3. **Carrefour Flash 10/10**: This app-free AI checkout system is a standout feature of Carrefour’s autonomous stores. Customers can scan their items using a camera and scale, and the system automatically calculates the total and processes the payment. The app-free checkout is particularly useful for busy shoppers who want to avoid the hassle of using their phones. The store’s design is clean and modern, with a focus on efficiency. The AI technology ensures that the checkout process is quick and accurate, making it a popular choice among Parisians.

Each of these stores offers a unique blend of technology and practicality, making the shopping experience both fun and efficient. Whether you’re looking for a custom pizza, fresh groceries, or a quick checkout, these autonomous stores in Paris are worth checking out.
</response>
gts:
3 innovation and digital news in 1 minute. Every Monday. Episode 275

News 1. Pizza but made by a robot

Pazzi is an autonomous pizzeria in Paris with another location in Serris in the East of Paris. They call themselves the world’s first autonomous restaurant. Customers order on a self order terminal which allows them to customise the exact toppings of the pizza. The robot arms then prepare the dough, add the sauce and toppings, put the pizza in the oven and cut it in front of your eyes. If you also ordered a drink you’ll get that from a vending machine. Opinion: Pazzi is an excitable example of how a human task can be automated. There is a large team behind it, so we expect to see more of these restaurants in the near future.

A not even that simple task is automated by a robot arm, fun to watch Pazzi make Pizza!

News 2.Click & Collect but cool

Delipop launched a pick up location for groceries in cooperation with Carrefour in October. To use its service, customers have to order groceries in Carrefour Drive and set the Delipop store as the pick up location. Customers can pick up their orders the same day if ordered in the morning or next day if ordered later during the day. Customers get an access code to enter the colourful Delipop pick-up store. Opinion: Delipop aggregates orders and thus operates at significant lower cost compared to ultra-fast deliveries. At the same time the fresh and modern designed pick-up stores can keep up with the coolness-factor of Gorillas.

A hip and cool pick-up store for groceries, we hope to see more of these around Europe’s neighbourhoods.

News 3. “Almost Just Walk Out” but more practical

Carrefour launched their new, first of its kind, autonomous store “Carrefour Flash 10/10” in Paris at the end of November. Utilising cameras and scales the store tracks the products taken and customers just have to pay — no scanning needed. Opinion: Compared to “Just Walk Out” technology, customers still have to pay manually. However they don’t need to download an app and register before before shopping. This makes this store more practical to use for a larger audience.

Convenient, no download of an app required.

### How Hard Should Your “Hard Sets” Be?

When it comes to strength training, the intensity of your workouts is crucial for making progress and achieving your fitness goals. One key aspect of high-intensity training is the concept of “hard sets.” But how hard should you push during these sets? In this article, we’ll explore the nuances of hard sets, the benefits of pushing to failure, and when it might not be the best approach.

#### The Benefits of Hard Sets

Hard sets are designed to challenge your muscles and stimulate growth. By pushing your body to its limits, you can activate more muscle fibers and promote muscle protein synthesis. This is particularly important for strength and hypertrophy (muscle growth) goals. However, it’s essential to strike a balance and avoid overtraining, which can lead to injury and burnout.

#### Bodyweight vs. Weights

When it comes to hard sets, bodyweight exercises can be just as effective as weightlifting. Bodyweight exercises, such as push-ups, pull-ups, and squats, can be modified to increase intensity by adding variations like negatives, drop sets, or supersets. These modifications can help you push your limits without the added stress of heavy weights.

#### Pushing to Failure: Not Always the Best Approach

While pushing to failure can be beneficial, it’s not always the best strategy. When you reach failure, your muscles are already fatigued, and the subsequent recovery period is crucial for growth. If you push to failure too frequently, you risk overtraining and compromising your recovery. Instead, consider using partial range of motion exercises or lighter weights to achieve similar intensity without the risk of overtraining.

#### The Importance of Proper Form

Regardless of the exercise or intensity, proper form is essential for maximizing the benefits of hard sets and minimizing the risk of injury. Focus on maintaining good posture and engaging the correct muscles throughout each movement. This will help you achieve better results and reduce the likelihood of developing bad habits.

#### Tailoring Hard Sets to Your Goals

The intensity of your hard sets should be tailored to your specific fitness goals. For strength-focused workouts, you may want to push yourself to failure or near failure. For hypertrophy goals, you might opt for partial range of motion exercises or lighter weights. The key is to find a balance that challenges your muscles without overwhelming them.

#### The Role of Rest and Recovery

Rest and recovery are critical components of any strength training program. After a hard set, it’s important to allow your muscles time to recover and adapt. This can be achieved through proper sleep, nutrition, and active recovery methods like stretching or foam rolling. By prioritizing recovery, you can ensure that your hard sets are effective and sustainable in the long run.

#### The Power of Hard Sets in Your Training Plan

Incorporating hard sets into your training plan can be a powerful tool for achieving your fitness goals. By pushing yourself to your limits, you can stimulate muscle growth, improve strength, and enhance overall performance. However, it’s important to approach hard sets with a balanced and strategic mindset, ensuring that you’re not overtraining or compromising your recovery.

#### Conclusion

Hard sets are a valuable component of any strength training program, but it’s crucial to approach them with a thoughtful and balanced strategy. By understanding the benefits and limitations of hard sets, you can make informed decisions that align with your fitness goals. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced lifter, incorporating hard sets into your routine can help you achieve your best results.

---

To pre-order, visit www.legionathletics.com/muscle-for-life-book/ and use the code PREORDER at checkout. We hope you’ll join us on this journey to better health and fitness.

---

Please let me know if you have any feedback or if you’d like me to make any further changes.
</response>
gts:
To get the most out of strength training, you must ensure that your hard (heavy) sets are hard enough and produce high levels of tension in your muscles.

This is easy to do. Here’s how it works in the program in my new book Muscle for Life:

End all hard sets of bodyweight exercises 1 rep shy of muscle failure, which is the point where you fail to complete a rep. That is, continue hard sets of bodyweight exercises until you feel you have 0 good reps left in the tank.

End all hard sets of machine, dumbbell, and barbell exercises 2 to 3 reps shy of muscle failure (1 to 2 good reps left).

And how do you gauge this accurately and know how close you are to muscle failure?

It’s mostly a matter of trial and error, but once you get underway, you’ll quickly become attuned to how your form is holding up.

An easy way to develop this intuition is, as you’re approaching the end of a hard set, to ask yourself, “If I absolutely had to, how many more reps could I get with good form?”

Your instinctive answer will often be accurate, especially as you become more experienced.

Why not go right up to the point of muscle failure?

Mostly because it’s unnecessary for gaining muscle and strength and increases the risk of injury. As our muscles become fatigued, we can lose the ability to feel what we’re doing with our body and think we’re maintaining good form when we’re not.

Surprisingly, you’ve just learned one of the greatest “secrets” of successful strength training: knowing how hard to train in your workouts.

Many people don’t work hard enough and wonder why nothing changes, and many others work too hard and wonder why they’re always stuck in a rut and hurting.

You now know how to thread this needle effectively.

Want connect-the-dots simple beginner, intermediate, or advanced strength training programs that put this technique into effective use?

Click the link below to pre-order Muscle for Life now:

⇒ www.legionathletics.com/muscle-for-life-book/

Go for it!

P.S. If you do pre-order the book, make sure to keep your email receipt because I’ll be giving away thousands of dollars of glorious goodies, and there will be several ways to enter to win, including buying books, spreading the word, following me on social media, and more.

More details to come soon!
